attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Austrian School of Economics has pointed out for a long time that the income tax discourages investment, saving and hard work.

After all what is the point of working your backside off if the government will decide how much you get to keep? Also they want to make sure they can fund all their social experiments for you to support people who do not know and have never met.

Abolishing the income tax would shorten government revenue. But that is good news. People will no longer have to fund a growing welfare state, pre-emptive wars and bank bailouts that they don't agree with.

If the government truly believes in economic freedom, they will heed this petition.
